price: ‹ ߊߟߊ߫ › ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ ߞߊ߬ ߥߊ߯ߕߌ߫ ߖߋ߬ߟߌ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߊ߲߬ ߛߊ߲߬ ߦߙߌߞߊ ߘߐ߫؟
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
